name: Rage Attack
description:
This is a game i made for brackeys game jam 2021.1

For some reason the webgl version has no sounds.

CONTROLS

To shoot, press and hold the left mouse button.

WSDA to move the character.

Press P to pause the game.

CREDITS

Music made by Cron Audio, Downloaded from unity asset store.

Fonts made by Tiny Worlds, Downloaded from unity asset store.

I used EZCameraShaker for this game;

All the code and art made by me.
